comments:
3.0 M6

In my existing workspace I wanted to switch to the Expression view and got an
exception (see Ex1 below). The view could not be shown.

I closed and reopened the view and got an error dialog (see Ex2 below) but this
time the view could be shown and initialized.

The NPE is coming from CORE in IExtensionPoint.getConfigurationElements(). 
This means the Expression manager did not initialize properly, and thus, the 
second NPE.

Would you have a reproducible test case?
It seems to be similar to bug #49622 in that it seems to be a registry bug.

Closing as we do not have steps and it seems to work in M6.
Please re-open if necessary
